meanings: (상태·품질 등이) good, fine, nice, (다른 것보다) better (than), superior (to)
토픽 It looks like it will be a fine day.
토픽 It looks like we'll have good weather today.

meanings.meaning: I, etc. would just as soon do something

vlive.korean: 편지 같은 거 써도 좋을 것... write a letter on this too. 듣기 View video Dispatch : 트와이스 ‘디아이콘’ 언박싱🐰🐹🦅
